name: modify_energy_plus_fan_variable_volume_objects
display_name: Modify Energy Plus Fan Variable Volume Objects
name_xml: Modify EnergyPlus Fan Variable Volume Objects
modeler_description_xml: Maximum Flow Rate and and Pressure Rise values for all Fan:VariableVolume objects in the model will be set to the requested SI value.
description_xml: Set the Maximum Flow Rate and and Pressure Rise values for all Fan:VariableVolume objects in the model. Input values are in SI units.
